form.p: Enter your email address to receive email notifications of new posts from USD247.com

p.span: PLEASE NOTE: These activities & events are TENTATIVE and may change.

div.p:
Bullying Prevention: 1-800-332-6378
Kansas School Safety: 1-877-626-8203
Shriners Hospitals for Children: 1-800-237-5055

div.div: Our Vision Success through Excellence: Everyone, Everywhere, Everyday Mission Statement USD 247 will educate and empower every student to achieve success through high levels of learning within a positive culture. Core Values Courteous, Dedicated, High Expectations, Integrity, Inviting/Welcoming, Open to New Ideas, Positive Atmosphere, Respectful, Unified.

Color Scheme "Lancer Blue" (unofficial) Hex #62A8E5 | Pantone 292
RGB 98,168,229 | CMYK 57,27,0,10
Silver: Hex #C0C0C0
Black: Hex #000000
Navy: Hex #000080
Lancer logo (click to enlarge)
This institution is an equal opportunity provider. Read the full USDA Nondiscrimination Statement.

An Equal Employment/Educational Opportunity Agency USD 247 Southeast does not discriminate on the basis of race, color, national origin, sex, disability, or age in its programs and activities. The following person has been designated to handle inquiries regarding the non-discrimination policies: Superintendent Brad Miner 506 S. Smelter Cherokee KS 66724 (620) 457-8350.
Copyright © 2017 · All Rights Reserved
USD 247 Southeast Lancers
